features: BEFORE YOU DROP A BOMB, DROP A DUDE BOMB: When you use the all mighty DUDE Bombs, you can literally walk around like your poop don't stank. Just drop one in the toilet before you sit down, let it rip, and enjoy your deuce with confidence

2-IN-1: DUDE Bomb's odor destroying ingredients create an indestructible barrier that instantly freshens the air and your toilet bowl. 1 sweet little bomb with 2 awesome benefits, now that's some American innovation. So go ahead with your bad self while our bombs neutralize stank in the air and leave no trace of the crime

REFRESHING SCENT BLAST: Each bomb is made with a refreshing blend of fragrance oils that radiate lavender, cedar, lime, and eucalyptus in your bathroom. DUDE Bombs clean & freshen the toilet bowl while destroying all evidence of your poo dumps
NO MORE EMBARRASSING DUMPS: Say no to second hand stank and leave the throne smelling better than you found it. Gone are the days of those smelly embarrassing bathroom exits

FROM THE CREATORS OF DUDE WIPES: With billions of DUDE Wipes sold, we promise you we know our way room around the toilet. So join us as the revolution continues with DUDE Bombs, you'll have never felt so fresh after that morning coffee
body.description: DUDE Bombs are made with a refreshing scent blend of lavender, cedar, lime, and eucalyptus. fragrance oils that create a barrier that keeps odor in the toilet and instantly neutralizes stank in the air. Our stand up pouch sits conveniently on the toilet and can be simply dropped in the bowl whenever nature calls for powerful odor elimination. DUDE Bomb's odor destroying ingredients create an indestructible barrier that instantly freshens the air and your toilet bowl. 1 sweet little bomb with 2 awesome benefits, now that's some American innovation. So go ahead with your bad self while our bombs neutralize stank in the air and leave no trace of the crime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works pretty good!
reviews.reviewText: Clean fresh scent. Do your family, co-workers or roommates a favor and use these before you go. Outcome is better than with Poo-purri and other sprays. Tuck one in your purse when you visit someone else's house and save yourself the embarrassment of leaving your "scent behind".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought these as a joke stocking stuffer for my husband. Honestly, he's not the worst offender in our house-- our two sons are-- but I figured my husband could try them first and, if they work well, we could buy more for our other bathrooms.We have used Poo-Pourri in the past, but what I don't like about it is that the pumps leak a bit, so your hands end up wet/oily and smelling like the product, even after washing your hands. I even got it on my clothes once, which meant I had to specifically treat the stain.Anyway, my husband started using these in our WC in the master bath, and I noticed that it smelled like laundry detergent in there. I was confused for a minute because I don't have any cleaning or air freshening product that smelled like that, until I remembered the Dude Bombs.Long story short, they work, and the scent does linger a bit but smells SO much better than Poo-Pourri! I have purchased these to stock in our other two bathrooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars work great, smells fresh
reviews.reviewText: these work great, leave them in the bathroom, guests can feel comfortable when they come over and so can the family, you can go right into the bathroom after someone has dropped a load :-) without fear haha totally recommend, and good keep one in your bag for emergencies when you're on the go and need to "go" and don't want to get caught lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than POO spray
reviews.reviewText: I'm not a fan of the spray-type poo stink eliminator products: the pump breaks or the product runs out of the sprayer onto your fingers & hand.With the Dude Bombs, just open the bag, toss a pod in the toilet, sit down and drop off your sea-biscuits all while breathing in a very pleasant fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Scent Isn't Wonderful. Blue Residue Gets Left Behind.
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited to get these for our bathrooms. We do a lot of entertaining and some people are afraid to go do the deed, if you know what I mean. So, we got these. The scent isn't that great, yes, it's better than poo smell and it helps, but personally it's not a very refreshing scent, its nasty. But, the biggest complaint is it leaves a blue ring in the toilet. If you remember to double flush, hurray, the blue goes away, if you forget, you are stuck scrubbing the sides of your bowls. Personally I feel there are better products out there, won't buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These actually work!
reviews.reviewText: I try to keep them in a glass jar by the toilet. I always put one in the toilet because you never know. It is excellent cause you can also clean the toilet bowl with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have tried almost every poop spray there is, and they have NEVER worked. These pods not only smell fantastic but they really trap the odor. Leaves the restroom pleasantly fragranced. Even a few flushs later, there is some fragrance being released from the bowl. These are definitely my new "to go" (get it?) freshener!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective, great for a college dorm situation
reviews.reviewText: We use a spray at home for this purpose, but my son didn't want to take that to college, as they are more floral. I figured these were worth a try - and he loves them. He's in a suite with 3 other boys, so he's happy masking his "business" without worrying about getting teased too much for the product smell. The bag lasted him a couple of months, so we're putting it on our permanent college shopping list for him. The bag is fairly small, so he can easily stow it in his cupboard or dresser.
These work great and smell great! I will definitely buy more

Esto debería estar en la canasta básica jaja! Es un CORRAN y comprenlo. Mitiga al 100% los olores, suuuper fácil de usar. El olor es como a detergente en polvo para ropa, así que al salir del baño huele a super limpio. Si tuviera que poner un contra sería qué hay que hacer la descarga del agua dos veces ya que puede quedar un poco manchado de azul, y ese azul si no se remueve pronto después hay que tallar para quitarlo, de ahi en fuera todo excelente.
Me encanto, excelente producto y calidad y a muy buen precio
Confirmo el envío y recepción del producto, Excelente
